SELECT R.RESUME_IDX, U.USER_NAME, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(U.USER_BIRTHDATE, 1, 4)) AS USER_AGE, U.USER_GENDER, SUBSTR(U.USER_BIRTHDATE, 1, 4) AS USER_YEAR, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_EMAIL, RESUME_TITLE, EB_NAME, ED.EDU_NAME, S.SKILL_NAME, C.CITY_NAME, D.DUTY_NAME, E.EMP_NAME, RC.CAREER_CNAME, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RC.CAREER_SDATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM') AS CAREER_SDATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RC.CAREER_EDATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM') AS CAREER_EDATE, RC.CAREER_DESCRIPTION, COVER_LETTER, RESUME_HIT, RESUME_CDATE, RESUME_FDATE FROM RESUME R LEFT JOIN DUTY D ON R.DUTY_ID = D.DUTY_ID LEFT JOIN CITY C ON R.CITY_ID = C.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN EMP E ON R.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN EDU ED ON R.EDU_ID = ED.EDU_ID LEFT JOIN USERS U ON R.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX LEFT JOIN RESUME_SKILL RS ON R.RESUME_IDX = RS.RESUME_IDX LEFT JOIN SKILL S ON RS.SKILL_ID = S.SKILL_ID LEFT JOIN RESUME_CAREER RC ON R.RESUME_IDX = RC.RESUME_IDX WHERE R.RESUME_IDX=#{resume_idx}
